page.title: 05INTERVIEW WITH A WORKER
page.content: Name = Kenneth Atrill Home = Wootton 1. How old were you when your first job was at Stewartby?{ {About 30 years old. I started about {1930, and carried on until 1965. 2. Did World War Two (1939-45) interrupt your job? {No, I was too old for active service, {but I did have to serve in the Home {Guard (volunteer territorials).} 3. Why did you go to Stewartby? {The brickyard was the only place to {get a good job, with fair money in the {1930's, especially when I had four {children to look after.} 4. Do any of them work there?{ {No, there are too many other jobs {today which were not around then. Two {of them live in Australia, anyhow. }
